snippet.title: The Cecil: The Journey Begins | Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
On April 3, 2025, enter the infamous Cecil Hotel in The Cecil: The Journey Begins.

With immersive first-person action, shooter-style combat, and mind-bending puzzles, The Cecil will keep you on edge from start to finish. Every choice matters. Every encounter could be your last. And if you’re brave enough to explore… you might just uncover what really happened here.

So, before you settle in tonight, before you turn off the lights—ask yourself: if you checked in to The Cecil… would you ever check out?

Wishlist The Cecil: The Journey Begins on Steam Now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2019340/The_Cecil_The_Journey_Begins/
